subject: KIN
title: Theory and Practice of Movement Assessment
description: This seminar and laboratory based course will examine the theoretical and practical use of movement and strength assessment technologies and techniques. This course will cover approaches ranging from advanced research based technologies to clinical methods for the purpose of assessment. The course will also explore emerging technologies for assessment, including wireless and wearable technologies. The laboratory content will reinforce skill-based components to familiarize students with the use of a range of tools and techniques.
